title: The 5 best deals and sales you can shop this Thursday
text:
— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

There are few things I love more in life than a good sale. I mean, if you're going to buy these things anyway, then you might as well save a few bucks. If you're looking to save today, then you're in luck. There are a ton of sales on cookware, clothing, halloween costumes, and more. Here are our top five sales happening right now.

1. Save up to 70% on cookware at Sur la Table

Score all the coveted cookware of your dreams at unbeatable prices with Sur La Table's Anniversary sale. More

If you need new cookware, small appliances, or miscellaneous cooking gadgets, then this is the sale for you. As part of Sur la Tables Anniversary Sale they are offering 70% off all of your favorite cooking brands. I'm talking about Staub, All-Clad, Zwilling, Le Creuset, and so many more. With these discounts, you might as well scoop up a Dutch oven or stand mixer to get a head start on your holiday cooking and baking.

Shop the Sur la Table Anniversary Sale

2. Get 30% off everything at J.Crew

Save big on fall must-haves at J.Crew right now. More

Even though it's quite toasty in the northeast right now, I'm ready for cold weather and fall fashion. Nothing warms my heart more than throwing on a warm sweater or cozy cardigan, and I'm stocking my closet with some new styles. J.Crew is my first stop to shop because they have 30% off your entire purchase and 40% off fall favorites with the code TGIFALL. From sweaters to pencil skirts to chino pants, there's a lot to choose from. Happy shopping!

Save up to 40% at J.Crew with the code TGIFALL

3. Get 50% off clearance items at Wayfair

Save more on already discounted items at Wayfair. More

Wayfair seems to have a sale running every single day, but these might be some of the lowest prices I've ever seen on the online furniture site. Right now, they're offering 50% off warehouse clearance—which is a major discount on already discounted products. You can save big on lighting, bar stools, and even on last year's holiday decor, so you can be prepared for next year.

Shop the Wayfair Warehouse Clearance Event

4. Get $80 off four boxes from Home Chef

Get four meals for just $20 each. More

Trying to mix up what you're cooking for dinner? Home Chef is the best meal kit delivery service we've ever tested because it has high-quality ingredients, easy-to-follow recipes, and incredible meal options. Right now, new customers can get $80 off first four boxes (that's $20 off a box!) by following our exclusive link. We did the math and found that Home Chef comes down to $10 a serving, so it's like getting two meals free with each box.
description: As we gear up for spooky season, you can find incredible sales on cookware, decor, and Halloween costumes.
